title: College Farewell
description: Saying goodbye is never easy, especially to a place that gave me so many memories, lessons, and friendships. My College journey was filled with laughter, late-night studies, last-minute submissions, and moments that will stay with me forever. title: Srijan 2K25
description: A multi-disciplinary competition where we showcased our Biometric EVM project, receiving excellent feedback and learning from others' innovations.

title: IET KK Wagh Expo 2025, Nashik
description: At the IET KK Wagh Expo in Nashik, we explored a diverse range of tech projects, connected with fellow innovators, and gained valuable insights for future development.

title: Spandal 2K24
description: It was one of my favorite times ever. I really enjoyed participating in cultural programs, the fashion show, and managing stalls. We also organized the fun fair event under the guidance of our HOD, Vijay Malviya Sir. It was a truly memorable experience!
